channel.title: Dementhium (rune-mtp) *help shops*
channel.description: hey guys ive been working on a dementhium based server and i dont know how to make a npc open a shop... ive read tuts on it and it says i need to edit Npcoption.java and shopmanager.java.. i did all of that so im guessing the tut missed a step plz help. i will post if needed of shopmanager and npcoption
